pluggable.name: Keywords
pluggable.author: Petr Stuchlik
pluggable.description: Adds keywords, description and robots meta tags to each page.

help.value:
Keywords is a simple, yet effective Habari plugin which allows you to add HTML Meta tags Keywords, Desctription and Robots for each page type of your blog.

Usage:

  1. Activate this plugin.
  2. Confifure this plugin and set up default meta tags. You can use Advanced config to set up different meta tags for different page types.
  3. Fill in new Meta section on entry edit form - this way you can set up special keywords and description for each entry.
